position.name: ds
position.description: object to be converted to a dataset

keywords.name: title
keywords.description: title for the data, which could be used above a plot.

keywords.name: label
keywords.description: label for the data, which could be used as an axis label.

keywords.name: name
keywords.description: name for the data, which should be a legal Jython variable name.

keywords.name: units
keywords.description: units for the data, which string representing the units of the data.

keywords.name: resetUnits
keywords.description: assert units for the data, with no attempt to perform the units conversion.

keywords.name: validMin validMax
keywords.description: range of valid values for the data.

keywords.name: typicalMin typicalMax
keywords.description: typical range dataset, used for suggesting axis ranges.

keywords.name: cadence
keywords.description: nominal cadence, like 60s or 100Hz.  Note this goes with the independent parameter (timetags).
